local_intent: Detect the white_plate, perform approach and alignment, execute pick using existing grasp_key, and verify a stable grasp and object presence in gripper.
assumptions: ComputeGraspPose has previously populated blackboard key 'white_plate_grasp'.
Gripper is open and robot is positioned to allow approach to the white_plate.
coherence_with_global: This subtree implements the detection-then-manipulation fragment of the global pick-and-place sequence: it performs perception (DetectObject), fine approach/align (ApproachAndAlign), actuation (Pick), and verification (IsGraspStable, ObjectInGripper), matching the GLOBAL_BT ordering and GLOBAL_DESCRIPTION intent.
